articles.author: Derek Scally
articles.title: Poland accuses EU of blackmail over €1m daily fine - The Irish Times
articles.description: European Court of Justice imposes penalty in escalating rift over Polish judicial reforms
articles.content:
Poland has accused the EUs highest court of blackmail for imposing a 1 million daily fine until Warsaw suspends a key pillar of its disputed judicial reforms.

articles.title: 'No urgent need' for Covid vaccine boosters, say European experts - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Fractures emerge between countries over who should be eligible for third jabs, as scientists in the US question need for extra vaccination
articles.content:
Divergence over who is eligible for booster jabs has emerged between European countries over recent days.

articles.author: Zosia Wanat
articles.title: Poland hit with record €1M daily fine in EU rule-of-law dispute - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The EU high court penalized Poland for failing to comply with an order to suspend its controversial disciplinary mechanism for judges.
articles.content: Poland was hit with a record-high daily fine of 1 million for not complying with an EU court order to suspend the countrys controversial disciplinary mechanism for judges, the bloc’s highest court an… [+3028 chars]
